title: Chasing Vines
description:
In this week's episode, Sadie Robertson welcomes guest, Beth Moore, onto the podcast. Beth is an evangelist, best-selling author, Bible teacher and the founder of Living Proof Ministries. Listen as the two discuss stories of Beth's early days in ministry, how to hear the voice of God, and Beth's new book, Chasing Vines, 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
